title: Tutorial: First Steps
description: Learn the basics of combat in a guided tutorial adventure.

stages.name: Training Grounds
stages.description: Welcome to your first battle! Face Schoolboy Siegfried in a controlled environment to learn the combat basics.

stages.name: Advanced Training
stages.description: Notice how your character's HP and mana carried over from the previous battle - this happens between all stages! Face two Little Devils who will test your skills with their resilience and mana-draining abilities. Watch your mana carefully!
stages.tutorialMessage: Your HP and mana from the previous stage are preserved! Manage your resources wisely across multiple battles.

stages.name: The Wise Old Man
stages.description: After your battles, you encounter a mysterious old man sitting by a campfire. He smiles warmly and offers you both a healing potion and a mana potion to help on your journey.

choices.name: Accept the Potions
choices.description: Gratefully accept both potions. Restores 75% of missing health and mana to the selected character.

choices.name: Politely Decline
choices.description: Thank the old man but decline his generous offer. You prefer to rely on your own strength.

stages.name: Potential Ally
stages.description: As you continue your journey, you come across some individuals who could potentially join your cause. Each has their own unique skills and background. Choose wisely - you can only recruit one of them!

stages.name: Farm Disturbance
stages.description: You hear sounds of conflict coming from a nearby farm. Two figures emerge - Farmer Nina and Farmer Raiden, but something seems wrong. They appear weakened but still hostile. A gentle healing wind blows across the battlefield, offering restoration to all who fight here.

modifiers.name: Healing Farm Wind
modifiers.description: A gentle breeze carries healing energy across the battlefield.

stages.tutorialMessage: Stage modifiers can affect the entire battle! The Healing Farm Wind will restore 1% of each character's maximum HP at the start of every turn. Check the stage modifier indicator at the top of the screen.

stages.name: Tutorial Complete
stages.description: Congratulations! You've completed the tutorial. After the battle, both Nina and Raiden approach you. Despite the conflict, they recognize your strength and offer to join your cause. However, you can only choose one of them as your permanent companion.

unlockableCharacters.name: Farmer Nina
unlockableCharacters.description: A skilled farmer who wields a farmer rifle and has evading capabilities.

unlockableCharacters.name: Farmer Raiden
unlockableCharacters.description: A lightning-fast farmer with electrical attacks and evasive techniques.

title: Blazing School Day
description: Survive the chaos of a school day gone wrong!

stages.name: Burning School Gym
stages.description: The school gym is ablaze with unnatural fire! The floor burns beneath your feet as you face the fiery demon. Each turn in this inferno deals damage to all fighters.

modifiers.name: Burning Ground
modifiers.description: The ground is ablaze with hellish flames! Player characters take 150 fire damage at the start of each turn.

stages.name: School Corridor
stages.description: You reach a seemingly calm corridor. There are some useful items left behind.

choices.name: First Aid Kit
choices.description: Heal a chosen character to full HP.

choices.name: Red Adrenaline
choices.description: Inject a chosen character with adrenaline, boosting their physical damage by 20%.

choices.name: Student's Book
choices.description: Apply learned knowledge to a chosen character, increasing all stats.

stages.name: School Yard
stages.description: The school yard crackles with heat. Five Blazing Elementals block the path! Scattered around the yard are medical supplies left behind by fleeing students.

modifiers.name: Carried medicines
modifiers.description: Medical supplies scattered around the yard provide periodic mana recovery. Every fifth turn, restores 10% of maximum mana for player characters.

stages.name: Classroom 5B Door
stages.description: You find a locked classroom door. Perhaps someone inside can help?

stages.name: Rooftop
stages.description: The school rooftop offers a vantage point, but a fearsome Infernal Scorpion guards it. Dense smoke clouds the air and medical supplies are scattered about.

modifiers.name: Carried medicines
modifiers.description: Medical supplies scattered around the rooftop provide periodic mana recovery. Every fifth turn, restores 10% of maximum mana for player characters.

modifiers.name: Smoke Cloud
modifiers.description: Dense smoke clouds the battlefield. Player abilities have a 21% chance to miss completely and go on cooldown.

stages.name: Final Choice
stages.description: After the rooftop battle, you find a strange altar with three options.

choices.name: Mysterious Font
choices.description: Revive a fallen ally, restoring them to 50% HP.

choices.name: First Aid Kit
choices.description: Heal a chosen character to full HP.

choices.name: Risky Medicine
choices.description: A potent concoction. 50% chance to double the character's Max HP (and fully heal), 50% chance to defeat them instantly.

stages.name: Bathroom Entrance
stages.description: You hear sounds of struggle near the bathroom. Someone is bravely fighting Mr. Birdie, the corrupted cleaning man! Maybe they could join you?

stages.name: Bathroom Fight
stages.description: Infernal Birdie, the corrupted cleaning man, attacks with deadly chains!

modifiers.name: Carried medicines
modifiers.description: Medical supplies scattered around the rooftop provide periodic mana recovery. Every fifth turn, restores 10% of maximum mana for player characters.

modifiers.name: Small Space
modifiers.description: The confined space makes dodging impossible! All characters have their dodge chance reduced to 0.

stages.name: Principal's Office
stages.description: You've reached the Principal's office. Choose one final ally to face whatever awaits.

stages.name: Returning to the Burning School Gym
stages.description: The flames rage anew! The mastermind behind this chaos awaits in the restored inferno. The corrupted flames turn all healing into pain, while scattered medical supplies provide mana recovery and the ground burns beneath your feet.

modifiers.name: Carried medicines
modifiers.description: Medical supplies scattered around the rooftop provide periodic mana recovery. Every fifth turn, restores 10% of maximum mana for player characters.

modifiers.name: Burning Ground
modifiers.description: The ground is ablaze with hellish flames! Player characters take 150 fire damage at the start of each turn.

modifiers.name: Healing Fire
modifiers.description: The infernal flames corrupt all healing! Whenever a player character heals, they take 22% of the heal amount as fire damage.

stages.name: School Liberation Complete
stages.description: With the infernal forces defeated, peace returns to the school. Your heroic actions have saved countless students and faculty. In recognition of your bravery, fellow students who witnessed your courage offer to join your cause. Choose one of them as your permanent companion.

title: Corruption at the Farmland
description: Something is wrong in the peaceful farmland...

stages.name: An Angry Carrot
stages.description: A strangely aggressive carrot blocks the path into the farmland.

stages.name: Cottage
stages.description: You find a small cottage. Inside, a few farmhands are taking shelter. Perhaps one could join you?

stages.name: Mutated Animals Ranch
stages.description: The ranch animals have been horribly mutated! Survive the onslaught.

stages.name: Farmhouse Pantry
stages.description: You discover the farmhouse pantry, surprisingly well-stocked despite the chaos.

choices.name: Fresh Apple
choices.description: Restores 50% Max HP to the entire team.

choices.name: Juicy Pear
choices.description: Increase a selected character's Magic Damage by 30%.

choices.name: Ripe Watermelon
choices.description: Increase a selected character's Armor and Magical Resistance by 7%.

stages.name: Farm Well
stages.description: You find a well filled with clear, refreshing water. It seems to possess restorative properties.

choices.name: Drink from the Well
choices.description: Restores the entire team's Mana to full.

stages.name: Under the apple tree
stages.description: A large, ancient apple tree stands here. But the apples... they don't look right.

stages.name: Digged up treasure
stages.description: You unearth a hidden chest while digging near the tree.

choices.name: First Aid Kit
choices.description: Heal a chosen character to full HP.

choices.name: A Rare Bone
choices.description: Increases a selected character's dodge chance by 15%.

choices.name: Pocket of Weed
choices.description: Double your Magical and Physical Damage of a selected character but set armor and magic shield to 0.

stages.name: The Barn
stages.description: You approach the sinister looking barn. Inside, a Crazy Farmer and his Hound are waiting.

stages.name: Freed from the Barn
stages.description: Having cleared the barn, you find some grateful farmhands who were trapped inside. Choose one to join your cause.

stages.name: Hidden on the cornfield
stages.description: Lost in the endless rows of corn, you stumble upon some items hidden amongst the stalks.

choices.name: Water Bottle
choices.description: Restores 2000 HP and 2000 Mana to a character.

choices.name: Corn
choices.description: +80 HP regeneration to a character.

choices.name: Magical Ring
choices.description: Restores mana to full and grants the selected character +100 Magical Damage.

stages.name: Crowfield
stages.description: You venture into an eerie field dominated by a sinister scarecrow. Dark crows circle overhead, watching your every move.

stages.name: Farm Well Again
stages.description: You find another well. The water still looks refreshing.

choices.name: Drink from the Well
choices.description: Restores the entire team's Mana to full.

stages.name: A friend among the corns
stages.description: You hear rustling nearby. Could it be another survivor?

stages.name: Farm clearing
stages.description: The source of the corruption reveals itself! Farmer FANG stands with his twisted minions.

modifiers.name: It's raining man!
modifiers.description: Heavy rain falls from the burning sky! All player characters heal 100 HP each turn.

stages.name: Farmland Liberation Complete
stages.description: With Farmer FANG defeated, the corruption begins to lift from the farmland. As you survey the peaceful fields, three familiar figures approach you from the distance. Nina, Raiden, and Shoma, fellow farmers who helped in the liberation, offer to join your cause permanently.

unlockableCharacters.name: Farmer Nina
unlockableCharacters.description: A skilled farmer who wields a farmer rifle and has evading capabilities.

unlockableCharacters.name: Farmer Raiden
unlockableCharacters.description: A lightning-fast farmer with electrical attacks and evasive techniques.

unlockableCharacters.name: Farmer Shoma
unlockableCharacters.description: A farm-raised baseball prodigy with extraordinary critical hit chance and healing abilities.

title: To The Hell We Go
description: Venture into the depths of hell itself and make dark pacts for power.

stages.name: The Devil's Bargain
stages.description: At the gates of hell, a demon offers you power at a price. Each choice will permanently alter one of your companions. Choose wisely, for there is no going back.

choices.name: Lava Sample
choices.description: Infuse a character with molten lava essence, setting their magical damage to exactly 200.

choices.name: Demon Claws
choices.description: Graft demonic claws onto a character, increasing their physical damage by 80 but making them unable to dodge.

choices.name: Hellish Pact
choices.description: Form a dark pact that increases a character's HP by 2000 but curses them to take 75 damage each turn.

stages.name: Hell's Entrance Hall
stages.description: As you descend into hell proper, you encounter Morissa the succubus lounging on a throne of bones, flanked by her bumbling helper Scamp. She eyes you with predatory interest, while Scamp fumbles with his pitchfork behind her.

stages.name: Calling for Reinforcements
stages.description: After your first battle in hell, you realize you'll need more allies to survive the depths ahead. Using a hellish communication crystal, you can call upon some of your unlocked champions to join your cause. Choose one additional ally to strengthen your team for the trials ahead.
stages.description_detail: Select one character from 3 randomly chosen champions from your collection to add to your team. This ally will join you for the remainder of your journey through hell.

stages.name: Hellish Sacrifices
stages.description: Deeper in hell, a malevolent entity offers you three dark choices. Each sacrifice grants power, but at a terrible cost to your team. The decision you make here will affect all your companions.

choices.name: Sacrifice for Mana
choices.description: ALL your characters lose 15% of their current HP to restore mana to full. The price of power is blood.

choices.name: Sacrifice for Power
choices.description: Your armor and magical shield is decremented by 5 (all characters) to increase your Magical Damage and Physical Damage by 100.

choices.name: Sacrifice for Life
choices.description: Sacrifice a selected character to restore your remaining characters to full HP and Full mana. The ultimate price for the ultimate reward.

stages.name: Smith Cave
stages.description: Deep in the volcanic chambers of hell, you discover the forge of the Smith Lord. The air crackles with demonic magic as enchanted weapons amplify the strength of all who dwell here. A lava chimp screeches from the shadows while the vile Vulgrim lurks nearby, all under the watchful eye of the Smith Lord himself.

modifiers.name: Enchanted Weapon
modifiers.description: The forge's demonic magic enchants all weapons! Enemy characters gain +15% physical damage every 5th turn (turns 5, 10, 15, etc.).

stages.name: Molten Weapons Choice
stages.description: After defeating the Smith Lord, you discover three legendary molten weapons forged in the depths of hell itself. Each weapon pulses with infernal power, and you can only choose one to enhance your strongest champion. The weapon's power will permanently bond with the selected character.

choices.name: Molten Hammer
choices.description: A massive hammer forged from the core of a hellish volcano. Its weight and power will significantly increase the physical damage of the chosen character by 200.

choices.name: Molten Scythe
choices.description: A cursed scythe that feeds on hellish energy, growing stronger with each battle. It will increase all stats of the chosen character by 1% every turn, creating an ever-growing power.

choices.name: Molten Spear
choices.description: A swift spear infused with the agility of hellish winds. It will enhance the chosen character's dodging abilities, increasing their dodge chance by 18%.

stages.name: Desert in Hell
stages.description: Venturing deeper into hell's domain, you arrive at the endless burning desert where the twin demons Hotshot Diablo and Hotshot Diabla have made their lair. The scorching heat of this hellish wasteland heightens everyone's reflexes to deadly perfection, making every strike a potential critical blow.

modifiers.name: Desert Heat
modifiers.description: The scorching desert heat heightens all reflexes! All characters have their critical strike chance set to 50%.

stages.name: Demonic Reinforcements
stages.description: After surviving the scorching desert trials, you discover an ancient hellish summoning circle. The demonic magic within allows you to call forth additional champions to aid in your journey deeper into hell's domain. The circle pulses with dark energy, offering you the power to recruit one more ally.
stages.description_detail: The hellish summoning circle allows you to call upon one additional champion from your collection. Choose wisely, as the trials ahead will test your expanded team to their limits.

stages.name: Infernal Beast Gauntlet
stages.description: In the deepest caverns of hell, four legendary beasts have gathered to test the mettle of any who dare venture into their domain. The ancient Cursed Lion prowls alongside the massive Hellboar, while the Hell Fly buzzes overhead. The colossal Lava Worm emerges from molten pools, ready to challenge any who dare approach. The air crackles with primal fury as these corrupted creatures prepare to unleash their hellish wrath.

modifiers.name: Pack Healing
modifiers.description: When an enemy dies, all remaining enemies heal to full HP. The bond between these beasts runs deep.

stages.name: Hell's Oasis
stages.description: After surviving the brutal gauntlet of infernal beasts, you discover a hidden oasis deep in hell's most treacherous depths. Ancient hellish magic has created three pools of power, each offering different forms of restoration to those who have proven their worth against the legendary creatures. The pools shimmer with otherworldly energy, beckoning to your battle-weary team.

choices.name: Pool of Infernal Mana
choices.description: A bubbling pool of blue hellfire that completely restores a character's magical energy to its maximum capacity.

choices.name: Pool of Vitality
choices.description: A crimson pool that pulses with life force, fully healing a character's wounds and restoring them to perfect health.

choices.name: Pool of Demonic Protection
choices.description: A shimmering pool of molten metal that permanently enhances a character's defensive capabilities, increasing their armor and magical resistance by 8%.

stages.name: Oasis Exit
stages.description: Refreshed by one last drink from the oasis, your team feels a surge of arcane energy before pressing onward.

choices.name: Take One Last Drink
choices.description: Restore 25% of maximum mana to all characters in your team.

stages.name: Hell Castle Entrance Guardians
stages.description: Your journey through hell has led you to the imposing gates of Hell Castle itself. Before the massive obsidian doors stand two ancient guardians who have protected this threshold for millennia. The stone gargoyle Gargolyan, with eyes that burn like embers, and the fearsome demon HellHorn, whose horns pierce the very air with their malevolent presence. Neither will yield without proving your worth in combat.

modifiers.name: Aggressive Protection
modifiers.description: The castle guardians inspire fierce combat! When a character dodges, they gain +30% dodge chance for 3 turns. When someone deals damage, they gain +100 magical damage and +80 physical damage for 3 turns (stacking).

stages.name: Final Preparation
stages.description: Having defeated the castle guardians, you stand before the final threshold of Hell Castle. Ancient demonic magic swirls around you, offering one last chance to prepare for the ultimate confrontation ahead. The very air crackles with power as two mystical options present themselves to strengthen your resolve.

choices.name: Summon Hellish Ally
choices.description: Channel the chaotic energies of hell to randomly summon a powerful ally from your collection to join your final assault.

choices.name: Infernal Restoration
choices.description: Draw upon the castle's ancient power to completely restore all your team members to full health and mana, preparing them for the trials ahead.

stages.name: Hell Castle Throne
stages.description: You enter the throne room of Hell Castle. The skeletal guards Kroudin and Skress stand beside Grok, the Hell Lord himself. Only by defeating them all can you escape the depths of hell.

modifiers.name: Essence Transfer
modifiers.description: When a character dies, their stats transfer to a random survivor, adding to the recipient's power.

modifiers.name: Healing Mana Flow
modifiers.description: Healing also restores 20% of the heal amount as mana.

title: Saving Atlantis
description: The ancient underwater kingdom of Atlantis is under attack by dark forces. Only champions with Atlantean heritage can venture into the depths to save the realm.

stages.name: The Deep Waters
stages.description: As you descend into the darkened depths of Atlantis, you encounter Shadowfin, a mysterious shadow entity that has been corrupting the waters. Three vicious piranhas circle around it, ready to defend their dark master. The protective waters of your homeland surge with healing energy, restoring your strength each turn.

modifiers.name: Aquatic Home Protector
modifiers.description: The protective waters of the Atlantean realm heal player characters by 245 HP at the start of each turn.

stages.name: Atlantean Blessings
stages.description: Having defeated the dark forces in the deep waters, the ancient spirits of Atlantis appear before you, offering their blessings to aid in your quest to save the realm. Each blessing will enhance your entire team's capabilities for the remainder of your journey.

choices.name: Blessing of the Depths
choices.description: The spirits grant your team the blessing of the ocean's vitality. All team members gain 10% Lifesteal, allowing them to recover health with every attack.

choices.name: Blessing of the Tides
choices.description: The flowing tides reduce the strain of using abilities. All team members' abilities cost 50% less mana to cast.

choices.name: Blessing of the Currents
choices.description: The swift currents of Atlantis enhance your reflexes. All team members' Q abilities have their cooldown reduced by 1 turn.

stages.name: Frozen Underground Ruins
stages.description: Following ancient maps discovered in the depths, you venture into the frozen underground ruins that were once part of ancient Atlantis before the great ice age. These crystalline caverns hold the remnants of a lost civilization, guarded by frozen soldiers who still patrol the halls and the legendary ice master Sub Zero. The bitter cold preserves their forms, but their duty remains eternal.

modifiers.name: Atlantean Ambush Defense
modifiers.description: Ancient Atlantean wards protect their champions from ambushers, granting them +25 Armor and +25 Magical Shield.

stages.name: Alliance with Sub Zero
stages.description: Impressed by your valor, Atlantean Sub Zero pledges his icy might to your cause.

stages.name: Ambush of the Shadow Assassins
stages.description: While traversing a narrow Atlantean trench, your champions are ambushed by a deadly cadre of assassins lurking in the shadows of the deep.

modifiers.name: Aquatic Home Protector
modifiers.description: The protective waters of the Atlantean realm heal player characters by 245 HP at the start of each turn.

modifiers.name: Freezing Waters
modifiers.description: All player abilities that target enemies have a 38% chance to freeze the target for 2 turns. Frozen enemies have only 40% chance for their abilities to succeed.

stages.name: Returning Home
stages.description: After the fierce battle with the shadow assassins, you find sanctuary in a peaceful Atlantean healing chamber. The ancient waters restore your strength completely, and you are joined by Atlantean Christie, a skilled assassin who has been protecting the sacred waters. With your team fully healed and reinforced, you are ready to face the ultimate threat lurking in the deepest depths.

stages.name: Dark Underwater Cave
stages.description: Deep beneath the ocean floor lies a massive underwater cavern shrouded in darkness. Ancient corruption has awakened the Dark Leviathan, a colossal sea beast that guards the deepest secrets of Atlantis. With your team fully restored and reinforced with Atlantean Christie's skills, you venture into the abyss to face this ultimate threat to your homeland.

modifiers.name: Aquatic Home Protector
modifiers.description: The protective waters of the Atlantean realm heal player characters by 245 HP at the start of each turn.

modifiers.name: Atlantean Purification
modifiers.description: The pure waters of Atlantis instantly cleanse all debuffs from characters at the start of each turn.

modifiers.name: Tidal Wave Chaos
modifiers.description: Every 6th turn, a massive tidal wave crashes across the battlefield! Each character has a 50% chance to either take 1000 damage or heal 1000 HP.

stages.name: Atlantean Recovery Chamber
stages.description: After defeating the Dark Leviathan, you discover an ancient Atlantean recovery chamber filled with mystical artifacts and healing pools. The chamber offers three powerful boons to aid your team. Choose wisely, as each option will provide different advantages for your future endeavors.

choices.name: Pool of Infinite Mana
choices.description: Immerse your entire team in the mystical mana pool, completely restoring all team members' magical energy to full capacity.

choices.name: Crystal of Magical Enhancement
choices.description: Choose one team member to receive the blessing of an ancient Atlantean crystal, permanently increasing their magical damage by 200.

choices.name: Blessing of Enduring Magic
choices.description: The ancient spirits grant your entire team enhanced magical resilience. All buffs will now last 1 additional turn, making your magical enhancements more persistent.

stages.name: The Ruler's Return
stages.description: As you prepare for the final confrontation, a powerful presence emerges from the deepest sanctum of the ancient palace. Atlantean Kotal Kahn, the rightful ruler of Atlantis, steps forward from his meditative state where he has been channeling the ocean's power to resist the corruption. Having witnessed your heroic deeds throughout Atlantis, he pledges his strength to join your cause in the ultimate battle to save his realm from eternal darkness.

stages.name: Ancient Atlantean Throne Room
stages.description: Your journey reaches its climax in the ancient throne room of Atlantis, where the ocean's greatest powers once ruled. Here, the corrupted remnants of Atlantean Zasalamel and Atlantean Shinnok await - two powerful beings who have fallen to the darkness of the abyss. These ancient lords of Atlantis have been twisted by dark magic and now seek to drag the entire realm into eternal shadow. This is your final stand to save Atlantis from complete destruction.

modifiers.name: Aquatic Home Protector
modifiers.description: The protective waters of the Atlantean realm heal player characters by 245 HP at the start of each turn.

modifiers.name: Dark Current
modifiers.description: The dark waters drain the strength from all abilities. Using an ability costs an additional 20 mana.
